committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill relating to decennial censuses of population.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to ensure that during any decennial census: (1) no member of the armed forces, or dependent of such member, is excluded based on such member's being assigned to a post outside the United States; and (2) any alien not lawfully admitted for permanent residence is not included.

titles.title: A bill relating to decennial censuses of population.
